subtitleNullable: Approx 150,000 news articles from The Guardian.
descriptionNullable:
# **Context**
This dataset can be used for NLP tasks such as text summarization, either extractive or abstractive. Other tasks that can use this dataset: topic modeling, classification

# **Content**
This dataset contains about 150,000 news articles scraped using The Guardian's well-designed API. The articles are from January 2016 through end of June 2022. No filters on topic or keywords were used. Approximately 2000 articles from each month were collected, ordered by 'newest'.
No special preprocessing was done. This was to give users of this dataset ability to preprocess this data in anyway they wish.

# **Acknowledgements**
This dataset was created using The Guardian's [Open Platform](https://open-platform.theguardian.com/access/). I am not affiliated with The Guardian in any capacity. My intention while creating this dataset and publishing to Kaggle was to help others in need of a dataset for summarization or other NLP tasks.
title: Guardian News Articles
